about_the_game:
Gachi Defense is an incredible combination of fantasy and Gachimuchi in the genre of survival with elements of tower defense. Hordes of slaves led by Darkholme invaded the world of simple boys, in order to enslave everyone. Your goal is to hold out as long as possible, crushing every enemy that tries to get close to you.



The world is filled with thousands of slaves... Each of them is eager to enslave peaceful boys and turn them into their own kind. Do you think your Gachimuchi settlement is safe? Wait and pray that it does not get in the way of the Legion of the Whip!




Lead the hero of Gachimuchi and upgrade his abilities by defeating enemies! Build barricades, defensive towers, various traps and other structures that allow you to crush the slaves.




Build a gyms and set up the production of resources, improve buildings to increase their efficiency. Erect defensive structures to prevent the slaves from destroy your settlement and enslaving peaceful boys!




Gachi Defense gives you the opportunity to use different tactics of the game, there is no single way to win. You can spend time improving the economy of the settlement, working towards increasing income and building defensive structures, or you can focus on leveling up your character and buying upgrades for him.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

name: Gachi Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10700F 2.9 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB GTX 1660 Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB RTX 3060 Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish
